alert.note: Alert for Logan County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:40PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Logan, Phillips and Sedgwick Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 540 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Iliff, or 10 miles northeast of Sterling, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Sterling, Holyoke, Julesburg, Haxtun, Fleming, Ovid, Iliff, Peetz, Sedgwick, Crook, Paoli, St Petersburg, Proctor, Padroni, Pleasant Valley, Marks Butte, Amherst, Highland Center, Twin Buttes and Fairfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Logan County; Phillips County; Sedgwick County
